Detailed Description

Utility class that handles various functions dealing with reflection.

string  PropertyPath,
out PropertyInfo  PropertyInfo 
) [static]

Gets a property's parent object.

Parameters:
SourceObject Source object
PropertyPath Path of the property (ex: Prop1.Prop2.Prop3 would be the Prop1 of the source object, which then has a Prop2 on it, which in turn has a Prop3 on it.)
PropertyInfo Property info that is sent back
Returns:
The property's parent object

bool  SimpleTypesOnly 
) [static]

Makes a shallow copy of the object.

Parameters:
Object Object to copy
SimpleTypesOnly If true, it only copies simple types (no classes, only items like int, string, etc.), false copies everything.

static void Utilities.Reflection.Reflection.SetValue ( object  SourceValue,
object  DestinationObject,
string  PropertyPath,
string  Format 
) [static]

Sets the value of destination property.

Parameters:
SourceValue The source value
DestinationObject The destination object
PropertyPath The path to the property (ex: MyProp.SubProp.FinalProp would look at the MyProp on the destination object, then find it's SubProp, and finally copy the SourceValue to the FinalProp property on the destination object)
Format Allows for formatting if the destination is a string
